description: Defines how elective components should be differentiated by section

theory.description: Theory classes are COMBINED for both sections A and B

tutorial.description: Tutorial classes are COMBINED for both sections A and B

practical.description: Practical classes are SEPARATE for sections A and B

theory.description: Theory classes are COMBINED for mixed group (A+B)

tutorial.description: Tutorial classes are COMBINED for mixed group (A+B)

practical.description: Practical classes are COMBINED for mixed group (A+B)

notes: AD electives: Only practicals are split by section (A separate, B separate)
AD electives: Theory and tutorial are combined (A+B together)
SS electives: All components are combined for mixed group
This change was made on 2025-10-29 to reflect real scheduling requirements
